body.description: Degree Clinical Protection Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers prescription-strength wetness protection, so you can face the day with confidence. This antiperspirant for women features 72-hour sweat and odor protection and the bright floral scent of rose and jasmine, blended with delicate fruit for an invigorating, clean feeling. Only Degree has MotionSense technology that moves in sync with your body. This clinical strength antiperspirant deodorant releases a burst of subtle fragrance every time you move, for nonstop protection. Degree Clinical Protection Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps you feeling fresher, drier, and more confident. This powerful antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most so that you don't have to worry about slowing down. Simply swipe and start moving. This antiperspirant deodorant for women with a tantalizing scent gives you the confidence to keep moving all day long. Degree Clinical Protection Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps you feeling cool, fresh and protected from sweat and odor. Degree gives you the confidence to keep moving, however you move. At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further. We’re here to support your journey through an antiperspirant that moves with you and helps you go beyond your limits. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging. Degree. It won’t let you down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Degree Women Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps excessive sweating under control, keeping you in the game with a clean, feminine scent. However you move, move with the confidence of 72-hour sweat protection from Degree.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This clinical antiperspirant deodorant delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Degree's breakthrough MotionSense technology reacts directly to movement to keep you feeling fresh and protected. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no mater how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD SUSTAINABILITY At Degree, we're committed to creating the most sustainable and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we're making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Shower Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.6 oz Degreen Shower Clean Dry Spray Antiperspirant Deodorant, 3.8 oz Degree Black+White Dry Spray Antiperspirant Deodorant, 3.8 oz Main Benefit Stay shower-fresh with 72 hours of protection against sweat and body odor. This antiperspirant deodorant spray goes on instantly dry for a cleaner feel. This dry spray antiperspirant deodorant for women helps protect your black clothes from white marks and white clothes from yellow stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works As Advertised!
reviews.reviewText: Has a nice fresh scent, not too powdery, very pleasant.Works extremely well, tested and keeps odor away for 72 hours!Price is reasonable, even more economical as you do no need so much.Overall, I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great protection, minimal white staining
reviews.reviewText: I put this on before bedtime as recommended by dermatologists and it works really well on keeping me dry and odor free during the day. The size lasts for quite a while. This deodorant does not irritate me even if I apply right after shaving. It is definitely on my list of reliable and we'll performing products. As an added bonus, the white staining is minimal considering that this is not a "clear" deodorant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best antiperspirant/deoderant
reviews.reviewText: I started using this many, many years ago. It's always been way more expensive than regular deoderant, but I have self-diagnosed hyper-hydrosis, and aside from the prescription stuff I used to stop the sweating in my late teens that may have had a small infinite effect, this did the trick as an adult. During Covid, when the price went from $7.xx per stick to over $10, I started using regular Degree. It smelled nice but certainly didn't keep me from sweating. I finally decided to bite the bullet, but accidentally purchased the Dove comparable. I was surprised my "Degree" wasn't working as it always had. I ordered it here, and like an old friend, it was tried and true the moment I used it. Fortunately, it was down to $8.xx. It creates almost a barrier on your skin... takes extra time wash off, but that's ok with me. I am confident and feel like myself again.

reviews.reviewText: It works well. Don't really like the scent. Prefer solid.

reviews.reviewText: No more sweat. helps with sweating. Good smell and it last all day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Deodorant on the Market!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I've used this Degree Clinical Protection deodorant for years and wouldn't even think about buying anything else. I'm Italian, which comes with many good qualities -- but excessive sweating is definitely NOT one of them. For much of my life, I dealt with the dreaded "pit stains" (yuck!!) and was so embarrassed. And then there was the smell of body odor-- if I didn't apply deodorant what seemed like hourly, I could smell myself. You can imagine how much fun this was in high school... living in Florida of all places. :/ I had almost given up on the idea and had even considered getting Botox injections to help cut down on the sweating, but then one day randomly got a coupon for this Degree Clinical Protection in the mail. For whatever reason, they actually didn't sell this line of deodorant in the grocery store I used to shop in so I'd never heard of it before. (Florida always seems to be lagging behind the times!) However, I was able to find it online (this was pre-Amazon Prime account for me... the dark ages!) When the deodorant arrived, I carefully read and followed the directions as I had done for all the other failed attempts at deodorants, but the next day, I honestly had almost no sweat under my arms and actually smelled good the entire day without once reapplying the deodorant. I thought that maybe it was just chance, but again, day after day, same amazing result. Finally-- no more humility and embarrassment, and no more sneaking off to the bathroom to reapply!If you've never tried this deodorant (or have tried it and didn't get the same results that I did) -- the secret it to apply it at night after you shower, and then reapply in the morning without washing off the previous night's application. I've tried skipping the evening application or even showering in the morning and then applying, but neither scenario works for me. It has to be applied in the evening and in the morning for the best results. On hot days, I usually reapply sometime in the mid- to late-afternoon "just in case" (or more so, just because I just like the scent). My favorite 2 scents are Summer Strength and Active Clean - both are very fresh smelling without being overpowering. I tried the Powder Fresh scent and personally thought it smelled like cheap baby powder. I also tried Fresh Energy and found it too floral and overbearing, and it also turned into more of a musty smell later in the day.I hope you have as great of an experience with this deodorant as I did! I don't usually write reviews this long, but this product has truly made a huge impact on my confidence and quality of life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Degree Clinical Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant in Stress Control, and it lives up to its 72-hour sweat and odor protection claim. The smaller 1.7 oz size is convenient for on-the-go use. The stress control formula adds a nice touch, and it has proven effective during busy and demanding days. The only downside is that it might be a bit on the pricier side compared to regular deodorants, but if long-lasting protection is a priority, it's worth the investment

reviews.reviewTitle: No me gusto porque mancha mucho la ropa

reviews.reviewText: CARISIMO no vuelvo a comprarlo pense que eran dos y solo llego uno
